tool_description: Creates detailed work orders from scheduled maintenance items with task specifications, resource requirements, and documentation.

schedule_id.description: Schedule identifier to create work orders from

include_parts_list.description: Whether to include estimated parts requirements

include_labor_estimates.description: Whether to include labor time estimates

priority_override.description: Priority override: none, low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Schedule not found: The provided schedule_id does not exist.
Invalid priority override: Use one of [none, low, medium, high, critical].
Schedule incomplete: The referenced schedule has unresolved conflicts or missing data.
usage: Provide schedule_id and optionally configure work order details. The tool generates comprehensive work orders ready for technician assignment.

work_order_ids.description: List of generated work order identifiers

total_work_orders.description: Total number of work orders created

estimated_total_hours.description: Sum of estimated labor hours for all work orders

creation_timestamp.description: When the work orders were created
